name: Vietnam tour - Impress Travel
overview:
Impress Travel offers private Vietnam Tour packages, specialize in customizing and tailor-making tours in the North, Central and South of Vietnam!

Vietnam package tours Welcome to a wonderful world where the colours are more vivid, where the landscapes are bolder, the coastline more dramatic, where the history is more compelling, where the tastes are more divine, where life is lived in the fast lane.

North Vietnam tours North Vietnam plays host to some of the country’s most delightful regions. Head out to colourful Sapa for some outstanding trekking amongst breathtaking scenery, enjoy the culture and majesty of the great city of Hanoi, and Halong Bay is located in Quang Ninh province, Vietnam.

South Vietnam tours South Vietnam Tour is one of packages for the travelers to have a glimpse of the highlights of southern Vietnam from the Metropolis Sai Gon to the wild and pristine Mekong River Delta. We’ll also travel back in times of the big war of this country to admire the locals’ resilience once put to test.

Central Vietnam tours Central Vietnam to historical sites, fantastic food and the country’s most iconic beach, central Vietnam deserves to rate as a top priority for travellers. Tourists wanting to avoid lengthy bus journeys will find Danang’s airport the perfect gateway to a fascinating set of the country’s most famous destinations, including three must-see Unesco World Heritage sites – history-seeped Imperial Hué, architecturally impressive Hoi An and the sacred ruins of ancient My Son.

Contact us: Website: http://www.vietnamtraveltour.net
